attributes.action: Support representations by the Iran Liberty Association to the International Court in Geneva to prevent repatriation of Iran Opposition group from Camp Ashraf in Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are real concerns that many of the 4000 Iranian Opposition group currently held in Camp Ashraf in Iraq will be executed if they are repatriated to Iran as the Iraq Government has apparently agreed with President Ahmadinejad. Please support efforts by the Iran Liberty Association to prevent this at the International Court in Geneva .
